column1: Obs lived at no. 8 Pomona Road and there was a large field behind it, which if the gauge was there would explain why it didn't move when a new water engineer took over
1909 Sept Gauge moved 133 yrds WSW from EastCliff Road
1920 Apr Inspection. Gauge old and in very poor condition. New gauge recommended. Open position except on NE
1925 Alt changed but nothing suggests it moved - changed again in 1951 to 165ft but no mention of gauge moving and this would have been quite far
1935 Gauge diameter changed to 5in so would appear to have new gauge sometime during the year
